website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for smaller spaces. Very affordable compared to the other products listed here.
pros: Comfortable and holds its shape well
cons: Must put foam into the bag yourself, which can be messy

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible, unbelievable, indestructible
customer_reviews.text: Last December 4 2018 I bought this wonderful bean bag. I gave it to my 4 grandchildren ages 10-age 2 today is November 22, 2019 and the bean bag is as new as the day I gave it to them. Rough use. Rough use with two boys and two girls. The bean bag is in constant use. I have never seen anything hold up like this been bag. It is like new a year latter. You must buy this! You will love it.seriously. It’s the best.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lis

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid and filled with garbage.
customer_reviews.text: They deliberately removed the zip head, so you won’t be able to open it and find out it's filled with total garbage. I managed to use a pen tip to unzip it, feel free to see what’s inside. Ew~ It’s the most uncomfy wasted $100 dollar I ever spent. It is almost impossible to fold it back to its original packaging for return and you gotta pay more for someone to have this piece of oversized garbage removed from your home. Biggest disappointment of all my purchase from Amazon. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable ... a real winner
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I repainted my daughter's room and she was looking to create a reading nook. So, I started researching seating options. This has fit the bill perfectly. Soft and durable, this was a real winner. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: jeffreywp

customer_reviews.title: Not quite Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Update: one of the dogs chewed a hole in the cover so I went thru Jaxx to order a new cover. It’s been 2 weeks now. I talked to someone from the company 2 days ago who said it would ship out yesterday but it hasn’t. Very frustrating. Next time I’ll find a different company. We bought 2 of these for our big dogs and they love them! Yes...they are pampered!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Bean bag for 1 maybe 2 dependant on size of persons
customer_reviews.text: I used this for myself for a min then my Cane Corso puppy loved it so it's hers now and is perfect for my dog as well as myself or significant other to relax on. My dog slobbers sometimes so being able to easily remove the jean covering to wash is ideal. It washes and dries easily like your jeans
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and good quality. We didn't have any issues with a mess when following the directions that came with the lounger in order to fill it up. I was a little worried that we had received the wrong item when I opened it and saw the camo print, but was very pleased to see that this company is using American made parts and the camo was a result of that! The camo print is the insert, we ordered a black microfiber fabric and that is what we got. We've had the bean bag for 5 months and it has been a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Love the color. The cover comes on/off easily. A little stiffer than I expected and the woman in the photo for this product must be short because I'm 5'8 and there's no way I would be able to lay on it like she is. I like that this is easy on the eyes and doesn't take up a ton of space. You can sit on it comfortably and not sink down, but don't expect to lay on it unless you're a child. I would recommend it, I have other bean bag chairs and this is my favorite because the others are either too big, ugly, or I sink too much.
customer_reviews.author: Freedomride

customer_reviews.title: This works great when we have company and would be perfect for ...
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size. They do take up some room to "store" them in a corner but everyone that comes over would rather sit in them over my other furniture. My husband and dogs lay on it every night. I bought this for my living room because I didn't want any more "solid" furniture in there. This works great when we have company and would be perfect for any tv/media room or play room. Large enough for a decent size adult.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A.

customer_reviews.title: I Love It
customer_reviews.text: The product is very high quality, I highly recommend. This is after just one hour, I did punch it to help separate the fill. I am five and a half feet of solid retired old man, I love this already. My new favorite seat, ahhhh!🤔
customer_reviews.author: TPop

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, more firm than expected
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 2 year old but it's probably better for older kids that are heavy enough to squish down into it. This is like a beanbag, it's way more firm than I expected & considering taking out some of the foam to make it more pliable. However, Do Not open or puncture the vacuum sealed foam until it is entirely enclosed in the inner cover unless you want a foam explosion that takes forever to clean up! Outer cover is fantastic quality and I love that I can take it off to wash it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge n Comfy
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was so confused. It was rolled up, I thought I had purchased the outside only. Unrolled it, and behold, everything was how it was supposed to be. Awesome product. So comfy and huge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You call this mandarin???
customer_reviews.text: I want to like this pillow, I really do. In fact I like it so much I bought it twice, and had to send it back twice because Amazon keeps sending me the wrong color! This is definitely not mandarin/orange, this product is clearly mislabeled.
customer_reviews.author: Eugenia Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Comfortable for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality fabric. My 9 year old loves it to sit in and watch TV or play video games... even to take a nap. It is a bit low on filling if you had a heavy person on it or multiple people. You can easily add more stuffing if that's an issue. Be sure to let it sit for a couple days for the foam to expand fully.
customer_reviews.author: clashcityrockr7

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality bean bag chair and definitely worth the price. I bought it for my 12 month old in hopes that he will keep it through the years. It's huge but easy enough for my toddler to climb around on it. It's great exercise for him as he practices climbing up and down. He uses it for reading, playing, bottle time and snuggling. It's very comfortable. The cover is soft and easily cleaned. It does need routine fluffing but I don't know what bean bag doesn't. Overall I am very pleased with this bean bag chair!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Messy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfy once you put it together, but it's not as tidy as the instructions make it seem. Our foam insert bag liner was caught in the zipper so badly that the zipper pull ripped off! See photo. Made a huge mess. Luckily I had already unzipped 2/3rds of the vacuum seal pack and could squeeze it out. Now that it's in use we love it. Very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Steigerwald

customer_reviews.title: Did not include foam.
customer_reviews.text: The invisible foam doesn't provide enough cushion / support and I can't think enough "happy thoughts" to make the bag comfortable. See the attached photo - the bag did not come with foam. Amazon rejected my more serious review, so the above is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: bdct85

customer_reviews.title: I would battle the foam again....
customer_reviews.text: We love our new bean bag chair from Jaxx. The 4 ft is definitely more of a jr sofa. You will not believe how small the box is that contains the vacuum packed foam/cover. For as small as the package is that arrives; the mess that is assembling the bean bag chair is the polar opposite. Foam. Everywhere. That said, I have already removed the cover and washed it and placed it back on without difficulty or incident. I would definitely battle the foam again....
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the sofa lounger! I bought this for my daughter and plan to give it to her for Christmas. I read most of the reviews prior to buying and glad I decided to purchase. Thank you to everyone's suggestions on how to fill the liner. It was very helpful and had no issues with the stuffing escaping! It took about a day for the stuffing to expand. I fluffed it a few times over the 24 hour period and it is now huge! I laid on it and it's comfy. I'm sure my daughter will enjoy lounging it very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: DIY Really?
customer_reviews.text: $100 and you have to put the bag together and the microfill is a nightmare since the "Kracken" air compressed bag didn't fit in the storage bag right. Microfill everywhere and a mess. Had to fill it by hand which took an hour. Overpriced ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Jaxx Saxx for the win!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best built sax for the price I have ever seen hands down. A lot of the reviews state that they do not have enough stuffing so I bought an extra bag and put it in the sax before I ever used it. That being said even a small price to pay for the best sax I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Westgate

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Good size and filling. Wish it would form more like a couch though.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lounger!
customer_reviews.text: What a perfect addition to our home. We are very pleased with the Jaxx Bean Bag Sofa Lounger. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Leta

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for 2 months now. It is holding up great and my daughter loves it! She even sleeps on it sometimes! (She is a small for her age 12 year old)
customer_reviews.author: MellyBeanMommy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great comfort, nice added features.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality micro-fiber cover. I love that it has an inner bag for the foam and added little features like a break-away zipper pull on the inner bag to prevent the little ones from easily opening it and making a mess. The packing was great, 20lbs of foam in a tiny cube surprised me but then it filled the entire bag very well. Overall very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: I really like these (got 2 of them)
customer_reviews.text: I really like these (got 2 of them), but they are slightly messy to put together. Be sure to follow the directions carefully, otherwise, it will be a much bigger mess. It worked great, and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Waunita Parrill

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bean bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bean bag, but didn't end up as full as I had thought it would. The outer cover is easy to remove and wash, but the inner cover is not water resistant.. Something to keep in mind if it will be used as a lounger for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Q

customer_reviews.title: good wise
customer_reviews.text: my daughter love it she use everyday sit with her friends so soft also fell sleep there haha enjoy and many thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Fama

customer_reviews.title: For humans and your pets
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter and she loves it. Very comfortable, you can even ask the dogs,lol.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Puntel

customer_reviews.title: Not a bean bag, but who would buy a foam bag?
customer_reviews.text: Hmm, what did I order that would come in a box that small? Yes, this huge lounger. Cool packaging and instructions. The shredded foam was frozen solid when we unpacked it so it took a bit longer to expand. I don't think my 9 year old has sat on anything else since, and I even fell asleep in it once. Yes, you have to fluff it once in a while, but this thing is sturdy and appears to be good quality. Do not hesitate. It is larger than I expected and has a big footprint, so may not be great for small spaces, but if you have the room, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: J. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice red color, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of the cherry red loungers for our movie room. I was a little concerned about the color as the pictures online varied from bright red to almost maroon. The color in person looks great, a nice true deep red. They are very comfortable and my 2 year old loves lying down in it and watching movies.
customer_reviews.author: Chase T.

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise works beautifully and as described
customer_reviews.text: Instructions didn't help, a bit messy to assemble, but otherwise works beautifully and as described. This seems rarer and rarer in Amazon world...
customer_reviews.author: Alton

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have neuropathy and comfort is key. They say 3 days to poof all the way however my 16 month and I been using it and poofing it. I love it. Can't wait to see how much bigger it'll get
customer_reviews.author: Nicole corder

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's Jaxx.
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Jaxx bean bag, which I bought directly from Jaxx. Wasn't sure if it was a knockoff because it did not have the Jaxx label as our 1st one. It has a tag for the zipper, which can be added by anyone. A little disappointed that I was not able to remove those stupid federal tag labels... left remnants in the seam. The fabric seems nice and thick. Hope this thing is legit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Beanbag on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (make sure you read the directions carefully) Overnight set-up to allow inside filling material to expand and fill the bag....and you're all set to go. Very Sturdy and great for kids, who love to jump on things. Comfy for kids and adults alike.
customer_reviews.author: P. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: AVOID
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. *NOT* a bean bag, completely messy... and you'll continue cleaning for months after putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a 10 yr old that thinks its a landing pad for high jumps. So far it has held up fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: The item came very small because it was vacuum pack. When i assemble it it was huge, larger than I expected. But it was okey my 2 1/2 granddaughter can use it until she turn to teen. I like I can lounge with it and is was easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Conchita Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected but a good size. Hasn't been the full 72 hours yet but super comfy and the bean bag fluffed right up and was super easy to set up. Thinking of buying another.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Jaxx Saxx
customer_reviews.text: This Bean Bag is awesome. Not your traditional bean bag but I saw the brand at a childrens recreation center and had to try it out once I saw how well they were holding up to that kind of abuse. It's really comfortable and so far durable.
customer_reviews.author: Epimetheus

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and big enough to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for my daughter. My 10 year old actually sleeps in this a few nights a week. Extremely comfortable, even for adults. I have even fallen asleep in here a few times and awaken refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Foster

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old is in heaven with this
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old daughter loves it! It's double-bagged so you can't feel any lumps.
customer_reviews.author: LoveStories

customer_reviews.title: The foam comes in a big square and you have ...
customer_reviews.text: The foam comes in a big square and you have to break it apart before even thinking about using it. The breaking is messy, little pieces of foam sticks onto you and gets everywhere however the end result makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my adult son, and he said he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great for grandkids tv/playroom
customer_reviews.text: Works great for grandkids tv/playroom!! Delivered on time and very well made-Little cumbersome getting set up, but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kim Bengtson

customer_reviews.title: best furniture purchase I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: best furniture purchase I've ever made. The two kids and dogs now have their own tough couch to play on. It's been durable. Dog hair doesn't stick to it, and when it gets funky, i can throw the cover in the wash. It's also the most comfortable lounge chair in the house. My favorite thing about this is the size. We have a tiny space, and the long shape minimizes the floor space it takes up. All other round beanbag style have been too big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: We received the wrong color. The zipper was broken as well. The zipper was closed but pulled apart.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and nice quality in a bean bag chair
customer_reviews.text: really cool chair I ordered for my grandkids to sit in and play video games. Unfortunately their game console arrived defective so the chair didn't get much us. I think I'll keep it anyway
customer_reviews.author: Willie g

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful chair and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so comfortable and unlike some other reviews, it was SUPER easy to get out of the box, punch it up, let it sit and voila it was good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Product did not arrive filled with stuffing.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived more like a really large, flat dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy MacIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: First bean bag arrived with a tear - company responded promptly and helpfully! Product is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Sasha DeLong

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! Very big my daughter hasn't slept in her ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! Very big my daughter hasn't slept in her bed since we bought it, she loves it. I intended it as a nice reading snuggle chair in her bedroom, not as a bed...lol! Arrives in a 2x2 box and takes a couple days to fully expand, although after 6 hours it was about 75% expanded.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not enough support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the high rating but in retrospect should have paid more attention to the negative reviews as those are legitimate comments. This item has very little support for adults (I am 130 lbs), may be comfortable for kids, I think a 30% more stuffing would make it better. The cover is of good quality and removable for washing, but overall I find it overprice for the comfort and support.
customer_reviews.author: boom

customer_reviews.title: Soo comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids love this ! Originally bought for child in near body cast as before he could not get comfortable. With this he was comfortable and slept thru the night.
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Large bean bag- easy to clean cover
customer_reviews.text: Just a tad larger than I expected. But, comfy. Pushed against a wall, 3 little kids have sat together on this to watch cartoons. One kid or adult can lay on this stretched out.
customer_reviews.author: hkath

customer_reviews.title: my son is 2 and he loves laying on this ...
customer_reviews.text: my son is 2 and he loves laying on this reading and playing his kindle. I use it when its not taken and it is quite comfy and doesn't deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Miss E

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: No fluff... The foam barley fills half the supplied liner bag, waited 6hrs, 12hrs, 18hrs. Flat....
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Our boys love them. They get flat too fast but you ...
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of these. Our boys love them. They get flat too fast but you just move them around a bit and they fluff right back up
customer_reviews.author: Jill A.

customer_reviews.title: We would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old grandson; he loves it. My husband and I both think it is comfortable and feels AWESOME; especially the back 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, but larger and a little firmer than I expected. Granddaughter likes it though. Pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 of these and our grandkids (ages 8 -12) love these bean bag loungers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these and our grandkids (ages 8 -12) love these bean bag loungers! They are used and abused a lot and are holding up well. Excellent quality. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is that the 2 blueberry microsuede covers I received are not exactly the same shade. Be aware that these 4 ft loungers are massive, but that's what I was looking for. Using these in lieu of a sofa for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: mimifromohio

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This beanbag is awesome. Extra durable! My teenage boys fight over who gets it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. My 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My 3 year old loves it, and we can both sit together while we read books with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Levitt

customer_reviews.title: Great dog beds
customer_reviews.text: Our boxer dogs love them. Easy to clean and long lasting. Still like new over a year later.
customer_reviews.author: Hoghead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. The other one either had considerably less filling ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2. 1 of them deserves a 5 star. Perfect. The other one either had considerably less filling and therefore not as comfortable. I hesitate to order more only bc it's a MESS getting the original filling in. Can only imagine what I'm in for when opening it back up to add more....
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 2 boys! They love it!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and comfortable! Excellent and quick customer service! My boys love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: zack gooden

customer_reviews.title: The filling was not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: The filling was not what we expected. This said it was an actual bean bag but instead was filled with some sort of chopped synthetic material stuff which then keeps in form and has to be rolled and fluffed often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE ENTIRE FAMILY LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: DELIVERY WAS VERY FAST. EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE ENTIRE FAMILY LOVES THEM. NO MORE WHO GETS THE COUCH!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Follow the unpacking instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Follow the unpacking instructions. If not you will make a huge mess once it start to expand.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin B.

customer_reviews.title: My son & Grandson fight over whose going to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: My son & Grandson fight over whose going to sit in it! Since it was a gift for grandson he won!
customer_reviews.author: Newg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and have handled the abuses of 2 little boys quite well :)
customer_reviews.author: DrTomma

customer_reviews.title: We love them. We followed the instructions and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 2 4-foot bean bags for my teen girls. We love them. We followed the instructions and it was easy to fill them. No mess at all. The hardest thing was separating the filling but it wasn't bad. It takes a few days for full expansion. They are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Elley Giesbrecht

customer_reviews.title: and it's a very easy process to fill up
customer_reviews.text: Huge! Follow the directions correctly, and it's a very easy process to fill up!
customer_reviews.author: brittany counterman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one AWESOME, HUGE bean bag, a little pricey but would recommend ......
customer_reviews.author: Izaboo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and it saves my furniture from childrens wear & tear !!
customer_reviews.author: Em Carter

customer_reviews.title: this is comfy man. I didn't realize how big it was but I love it
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't had a jaxx bean bag then get one lol
customer_reviews.author: Jomar Agosto

customer_reviews.title: Super like!
customer_reviews.text: It is huge! We are using it as a crash mat for jumping and more hard play and my son loves to relax and sleep on it. But it really is 4ft long ! Lol I didn't think that it was going to be as big. Love the American Made pride they show also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the bag yesterday and it looks great, seems like it will hold up and the outer cover is thicker than i expected. I also wanted to thank seller Jaxx Casual living for sending it quickly and even changing the color after i ordered since i messed up and ordered the wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! So comfortable in fact that I've accidentally ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! So comfortable in fact that I've accidentally fallen asleep in it several times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Both kids (2yr old and 4 yr old ) fit comfortably. The dog loves it too, have to keep making him use his own bed.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable. My wife wasn't prepared for how big it ...
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. My wife wasn't prepared for how big it is. It covers quite a bit of floor space.
customer_reviews.author: J Bender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter at college really loves this. Big enough to sleep on as an extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it! It’s huge! Very easy to set up and couldn’t be happier with the purchase. It’s worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It's been my knight in shining armor on a few occasions!
customer_reviews.author: JackieO

customer_reviews.title: kids (4&7) love for lounging and play
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably well done AMERICAN product, kids (4&7) love for lounging and play! Top quality, highly recommended over the tripe, cheap alternatives offered by foreign products in big box stores. Great marketing, fun feel from a com isn't that doesn't take itself seriously but does it's products.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ostrich

customer_reviews.title: After a ton of beating and fluffing it looks better now. It it soft and a vibrant red
customer_reviews.text: At first I was going to send it back because it was way to skinny and thin. After a ton of beating and fluffing it looks better now. It it soft and a vibrant red.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie brookhart

customer_reviews.title: Not 'all that'
customer_reviews.text: ok, when I first ordered I rec'd only the filling with no cover. They sent me another one after back-forth with Amazon over the fact that returning just the filling was impossible. Long story, I rec'd my bean bag and it's just simply ok. Nothing to over excite about...although it's seems like its more for a kid. I'm going to keep it but I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They love it. Very comfortable and they even use it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage boys ages 15 and 16. They love it. Very comfortable and they even use it to sleep on sometimes! Only big enough for one at a time. I need to buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: That's Not My Name

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! love that you can take cover off to wash. it's extremely comfy...
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old and he sleeps in it because it is so comfy. Love it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: F M. Swindell

customer_reviews.title: This beanbag lounger is awesome! Big
customer_reviews.text: This beanbag lounger is awesome! Big, soft and washable cover. Give it a couple days to expand fully. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Jenell

customer_reviews.title: but they are awesome. Great color
customer_reviews.text: We bought two to use in our kids playroom. We've only had the a few weeks, but they are awesome. Great color, super heavy duty fabric. They are heavy, but I like that! They are two heavy to migrate mysteriously around my house, like most of my kids other belongings. My kids jump on them, roll on them, stack them, and sleep on them. Great purchase. Oh, and they are lined. The outside shell can zip off and be washed. That was the really big difference between this and other products!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: After reading some of the reviews I was nervous about ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was nervous about setting the bag up but it turned out to be a piece of cake! It took no time at all with 2 people. It expands over time- a few days- do need to break it up by sitting on it. Our 13 year old son LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, LoVe, LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Kids love it! Dog loves it! I'm going to order the kids one so I can have mine back! 👍👍👍!
customer_reviews.author: SheilaDee825

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, what a hit. The family loves this thing! It's big, fluffy and cozy. Good for reading, watching TV, video games or just a little snuggling!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly O. May

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and my son loves it. Made well and very durable.just have to fluff it every few days.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. But I would like more stuffing
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. But I would like more stuffing, that would lift up the lounger so it wont feel like I am touching the groud
customer_reviews.author: Als Yeung

customer_reviews.title: This was a birthday gift for my 13 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 13 year old sone. He loves it. Plays video games or reads on it. It was a little messy filling it, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daeny

customer_reviews.title: I love that the cover is removable and washable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I love that the cover is removable and washable.
customer_reviews.author: Brieanna Frye

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and so easy to put together. Love this
customer_reviews.author: fairylily

customer_reviews.title: Big bag of Potatoes - Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The Bean Bag as all the reviews showed is not bean bags is full of foam that stays in one place - not comfortable at all and looks just like a big bag of potatoes. Super pricey for what I received - this was for my 9 year old daughter's bedroom. She has not used it all since it is not comfortable. I have to contact the company to see if they will take it back however not even sure how would I ship it back since it is heavy now!! Don't waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: B.

product_meta.title: Jaxx Bean Bags Sofa Saxx Lounger, 4-Feet, Navy Microsuede
product_meta.description: Color:NavyFor story time, nap time, play time and any time, kids, teens (and adults too!) love to snuggle into the plush and supportive foam of the Jaxx Sofa Saxx 4 foot bean bag. Fit one, two, or three children on this spacious cloud of comfiness. This miniature Sofa Saxx lounger gives everyone their own space. The ultra soft and durable covers are available in many colors that anyone will love. Each bean bag is filled with shredded furniture grade foam, with a cover that easily zips off for machine washing. Underneath, a protective liner with a childproof zipper keeps the foam contents out of reach and dirt from seeping in.
feature_bullets: 4 ft plush bean bag lounger / sofa for children, teens, or adults. Create a relaxed, informal setting or liven up your home theatre, dorm, game-room, or playroom.

*UPDATE* - Liner now comes fully assembled. No more messy foam assembly, just zip up the cover! Filled with finely shredded polyurethane foam that provides the perfect amount of support while remaining soft and comfortable.
Includes removable and machine-washable Microsuede cover, durable inner-liner with childproof zipper, and shredded foam filling. Seats 1 adult or 2 children.
Product Dimensions: 46”D x 34”W x 26”H. Made with pride in the USA (Atlanta, GA).

Includes 1 year manufacturer's warranty. For any issues regarding warranty claims, defects, or misshipments, please contact Jaxx Bean Bags customer service with your order number at 1-866-384-2802. M-F 10am-7pm EST.
